alert.note: Alert for Florence; Georgetown; Marion; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 06 at 7:20PM EDT until April 06 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Florence County in northeastern South Carolina... North central Georgetown County in northeastern South Carolina... Southwestern Marion County in northeastern South Carolina... Northeastern Williamsburg County in northeastern South Carolina... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 720 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Indiantown, or 11 miles east of Kingstree, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Johnsonville, Hemingway, Hannah, Poston, Nesmith, Brittons Neck, Indiantown, Outland, Gresham, Morrisville, Henry, Kingsburg and Stuckey. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
